attributes.action: GENOCIDE IN BURMA & OPPRESSION OF REFUGEES 2012
attributes.additional_details:
We need to take a stand as humans! We as a civilisation cannot sit back and allow this! We need to take a stand and unite against such atrocities! http://www.liveleak.com/view?i=724_1343311731
 It's very disturbing.
 EMERGENCY PETITIONFOR THE MUSLIMS OF    BURMA! WE NEED THR UK GOVERMENT & THE UN TO INTERVENE AGAINST THIS GENOCIDE! WE NEED AID AND HELP FOR THE REFUGEES IN NEIGHBOURING COUNTRIES! WE WANT SHEIKH HASINA AND OTHER LEADERS TO ANSWER TO THE CRIMES THEY HAVE COMMITED AGAINST THESE PEOPLE! THE BURMA GOVERMENT NEED TO BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE FOR THESE CRIMES AGAINST THE HUMAN RACE!
